survey_name: Consumer Preferences for Electric Scooters Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to understand consumer preferences, usage patterns, and satisfaction levels regarding electric scooters for personal transportation.

questions.question_text: How often do you use an electric scooter for personal transportation?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice scale for clarity. Ensure the options cover all possible usage frequencies.

script.question_text: How often do you use an electric scooter for personal transportation?

questions.question_text: What factors are most important to you when choosing an electric scooter? (Select up to 3)
questions.routing_logic: Respondents who answered 'Daily' to 'Rarely' in Q1
